headline: Willis Towers Watson (NasdaqGS:WTW) Names Paul Reilly As New Non-Executive Chair Following 2025 AGM
summary: Willis Towers Watson (NasdaqGS:WTW) saw a 3% price increase last week, coinciding with the announcement of Paul Reilly's appointment as the upcoming Non-Executive Chair, a strategic leadership change that could boost investor confidence. This move comes at a time when the broader market experienced a 1% decline due to persistent economic concerns, disappointing manufacturing data, and uncertainty surrounding tariffs. The contrasting performance of WTW shows resilience and a potential investor...

headline: WTW appoints Paul Reilly as Non-Executive Chair of the Board
summary: NEW YORK, March 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading global advisory, broking and solutions company, today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Paul Reilly to succeed Paul Thomas as Non-Executive Chair of the Board following WTW’s 2025 Annual General Meeting (AGM) to be held in May 2025. Thomas has notified the Board that he intends to retire from the Board and will not stand for re-election at the 2025 AGM. Thomas has served as the Non-Executive Chair of the
